description.value:
Your mech's cockpit is covered by heavy-duty glass, shielded by barriers, or completely sealed off using cameras to view the outside world, keeping you completely and protectively encased from the outside.

While in your mech's cockpit, you're protected from most hot or cold weather, up to Severe Heat or Cold. The heat and cold resistance increases to extreme when your Crafting proficiency increases to master, and to incredible when your proficiency is legendary.

Additionally, you fit your mech's cockpit with specialized air filters. While inside your mech's cockpit, you're immune to most inhaled poisons and gasses. You can also no longer be directly targeted by effects that require line of effect, but those effects can still target your mech instead, and area effects still impact you.
